front.title: APPN Implementer's Workshop Closed Pages Document DLSw v2.0 Enhancements

abstract.t: This document specifies a set of extensions to RFC 1795 designed to improve the scalability of DLSw clarifications to RFC 1795 in the light of the implementation experience to-date. This memo provides information for the Internet community. This memo does not specify an Internet standard of any kind.
